resources.string: Wijie Bar and Resto is a popular dining spot located in the heart of the city. With its cozy and relaxed atmosphere, it\'s the perfect place to unwind after a long day. The menu offers a wide variety of dishes, ranging from traditional Indonesian cuisine to international favorites. The bar offers a great selection of drinks, including signature cocktails and imported wines.\nThe staff at Wijie Bar and Resto is friendly and attentive, ensuring that guests have a memorable dining experience. The restaurant also has a spacious outdoor seating area, perfect for enjoying a meal al fresco on a warm evening. Whether you\'re looking for a casual dinner with friends or a romantic night out, Wijie Bar and Resto is sure to impress.
This is great, So delicious! You should try at least once. Best place for family dinner!!!
